author: Ben Cole
message: No laughing matter. There were no consequences. No one fired. Only some promotions. Gut wrenching to see how lightly S African citizenry is treated and taken. The evidence leader fails to ask how the promotion was possible if there were two lieutenant ranks and one captain rank to hurdle before getting to the major rank. Called damage control and sympathy mongering. Nust can't get himself to call it a national disgrace
